opponent.label: Adora
opponent.from: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
opponent.description: Adora is a young hero and weilder of the Sword of Protection. Using its magical powers she's able to transform into the legendary She-Ra, a warrior of legend with incredible magic powers. She's trying to save her planet from the Evil Horde. It's very stressful so she came here for a break.
